scenes.action_text:
BLAST FROM THE PAST - by Bill Kelly and Hugh Wilson 
         FADE IN:         SCENE 1 OMITTED         EXT. SAN FERNANDO VALLEY - NIGHT  OPEN on a MOVING WIDE SHOT of a mountain range with the distant lights of the San Fernando Valley behind it. BEGIN CREDITS as a NAVY JET drops down into the picture. PUSH IN on the jet's exhaust flame. Have the words "THE BLAST" come out of the flam
